short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to group Gmail emails by date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail Date Grouping allows you to better organize your emails in Gmail inbox. The extension automatically divides your emails by date, and even lets you collapse some days, that you don't want to be bothered. This lets you work more efficiently.
